title: Collaborative Learning and Participatory Design Program for Strengthening Mathematical Workplace Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Fundamental Mathematical Concepts and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Targeting Corporate Managers/Leaders, Emphasizes Learning Experiences Through Collaborative Task Solving Resembling Actual Work Environments and Reflective Contemplation

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% participation in a collaborative learning environment solving real work problems
Learners propose three or more math problem-solving strategies based on research questions generated during participatory design processes
Learners analyze their learning experiences through reflective practice and derive at least two improvement strategies

resources: Online collaboration tools (Google Workspace, Padlet, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
